author: Rebecca Klar
title: Maryland governor: 'I don't think it's helpful to encourage demonstrations' against stay-at-home orders
description: Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R) said Sunday he doesn't think it's helpful for President Trump to be encouraging protests against state stay-at-home orders put in place in response to the coronavirus pandemic. ...
content:
Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R) said Sunday he doesnt think its helpful for President Trump to be encouraging protests against state stay-at-home orders put in place in response to the coronavirus pandemic. 
Hogan noted that the protesters calling for business… [+1425 chars]
